Caption: Mr. C. Subramaniam gives away a prizes to a student
Description: The student receiving the prize is Mr. Purushottam Ganpatrao Manusmare (second batch Metallurgy). Mr. Sarosh Talukdar (from the first batch) is seen standing behind Mr. Manusmare. (Identification by Mr. Anand Singh Bawa and Dr. Vijay Batra). Sarosh Talukdar went on to become a professor of Electrical and Computer Engineering and Engineering and Public Policy at Carnegie Mellon University. Following his degree at IIT Madras, Talukdar went on to pursue his higher studies at Purdue University. He also worked at McGraw-Edison for several years, where he developed simulation and optimisation software for electric power circuits.
